Administer and maintain computer systems and networks, ensuring the integrity and functionality of the services and resources provided.

work.company: Fundaci칩 Hospital d'Olot i Comarcal de la Garrotxa
work.title: System Administrator
work.description: Manage and maintain the computer system and networks of the entire foundation, this includes the entire Olot hospital and the primary care centers (ABS) of the Garrotxa. This includes tasks related to virtualization (vSphere), backup administration (Veeam), creation and documentation of protocols (Dokuwiki), creation and review of firewall rules (WatchGuard), taking charge of projects according to the needs of the foundation.
